title: BRIEF-Coronado Global Resources Awards A$1.3 Bln Contract To CIMIC's Global Mining Services Provider
text:
BRIEF-Coronado Global Resources Awards A$1.3 Bln Contract To CIMIC's Global Mining Services Provider

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 13, 2019 09:01)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Coronado Global Resources Awards A$1.3 Bln Contract To CIMIC's Global Mining Services Provider Sept 13 (Reuters) - Coronado Global Resources Inc : * AWARDED A SIX-YEAR, A$1.3 BILLION CONTRACT TO CIMIC GROUP'S GLOBAL MINING SERVICES PROVIDER THIESS PTY * SCOPE OF WORK INCLUDES OVERBURDEN REMOVAL, HAULAGE, COAL MINING , RUN OF MINE REHANDLING SERVICES AND PIT DEWATERING * CONTRACT TO PROVIDE MINING SERVICES AT CURRAGH'S NORTHERN OPERATIONS

BRIEF-Coronado Global Resources Awards A$1.3 Bln Contract To CIMIC's Global Mining Services Provider
